Package emissary.directory

Class DirectoryProviderPlace

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.directory.DirectoryProviderPlace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServiceProviderPlace
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceProviderPlace
    public abstract class DirectoryProviderPlace
extends Object
implements IServiceProviderPlace
    DirectoryProviderPlace can be extended to enable registration for service discovery and access. This incorporates key attributes such as cost, representing the data processing speed of the place, and quality, indicating how effectively the place performs its function. Together, these attributes determine the total expense of the service and can be leveraged for processing optimization.

    • Field Detail

      • dirPlace

        @Nullable
protected String dirPlace
        A local reference to the directory that this place resides in. Every JVM that contains 'places' must have a local directory
        See Also:
        DirectoryPlace

      • localDirPlace

        @Nullable
protected IDirectoryPlace localDirPlace

      • keys

        protected List<String> keys
        set of keys for this place read from configG. Each of the values defined by SERVICE_PROXY.SERCVICE_TYPE.SERVICE_NAME.PLACE_LOCATION$EXPENSE from the config file or KEY values from the config file.

        protected List<String> denyList
        List of denied places in SERVICE_PROXY_DENY

        public DirectoryEntry getDirectoryEntry()

      • configureServicePlace

        protected void configureServicePlace​(@Nullable
                                     String placeLocation)
                              throws IOException
        Configuration items read here are:
        • PLACE_NAME: place name portion of key, required
        • SERVICE_NAME: service name portion of key, required
        • SERVICE_TYPE: service type portion of key, required
        • SERVICE_DESCRIPTION: description of place, required
        • SERVICE_COST: cost of service provided, required
        • SERVICE_QUALITY: quality of service provided, required
        • SERVICE_PROXY: list of service proxy types for key
        • SERVICE_KEY: full 4 part keys with expense
        Parameters:
        placeLocation - the specified placeLocation or a full four part key to register with
        Throws:
        IOException

      • nextKeys

        @Nullable
public List<DirectoryEntry> nextKeys​(String dataId,
                                     IBaseDataObject payload,
                                     DirectoryEntry lastEntry)
        Delegate nextKey to our directory
        Specified by:
        nextKeys in interface IServiceProviderPlace
        Parameters:
        dataId - key to entryMap in directory, dataType::serviceType
        lastEntry - place agent visited last, this is not stateless
        Returns:
        List of DirectoryEntry with next places to go

      • nukeMyProxies

        protected int nukeMyProxies​(IBaseDataObject d)
        Convenience method a lot of places use. Removes all items from the current form stack that this place has proxies for
        Parameters:
        d - a data object whose current form will be expunged of my proxies
        Returns:
        count of how many items removed
